H3.text: when did david akers kick the 63 yard field goal. September 9 , 2012

A4.text: On September 9, 2012, Akers tied the NFL record for the longest field goal by kicking a 63-yard field goal off the crossbar against the Green Bay Packers at Lambeau Field
